meanings.definition: A unit of length equal to one billionth of a meter.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used a nan to measure the tiny particles.
meanings.sent2: The nan was so small that it was hard to see without a microscope.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped the nan in the lab and it disappeared completely!
meanings.sent4: The nan of the hair's width showed how precise the measurement needed to be.
meanings.sent5: The nan was so minuscule that even ants seemed giant in comparison.

meanings.sent1: My nan bakes the best cookies in the whole neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time with my nan; she tells the best stories.
meanings.sent3: My nan challenged me to a race, and she surprisingly won!
meanings.sent4: Her wisdom was like a treasure trove, just like my nan's advice.
meanings.sent5: Every Sunday, my nan would knit me a new sweater with love and care.

meanings.sent1: The bakery down the street makes delicious nan that melts in your mouth.
meanings.sent2: I always enjoy a warm nan with butter for breakfast.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook the nan for a pillow because it was so soft!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly baked nan filled the entire kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The nan was perfectly golden brown, a true work of culinary art.
